description: {"blocks":[{"key":"9ukhg","text":"We have found that our Nf1 flox mouse colonies contained mice that had lost one of the two loxP sites inserted into the Nf1 gene (Parada laboratory, PMID:11297510, JAX# 017639), leading to loss of DNA recombination upon Cre-recombinase activity and loss of previously identified skeletal phenotypes. This is likely to occur in other Nf1 flox mouse colonies.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":23,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":120,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":129,"length":47},{"style":"italic","offset":333,"length":3},{"style":"sup","offset":27,"length":4},{"style":"sup","offset":337,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":164,"length":11}],"data":{}},{"key":"9cser","text":"We describe here a strategy to verify conservation of the loxP sites within the Nf1 allele and to sequence the loxP1 and loxP2 sites for detecting potential mutations or deletions. This may be done if the expression of Nf1 (qPCR) is not reduced in CreTg/+; Nf1 flox/flox tissues of interest.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":80,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":219,"length":3},{"style":"italic","offset":257,"length":4},{"style":"sup","offset":251,"length":4},{"style":"sup","offset":261,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"B78DAE456C6511EFBAD90A58A9FEAC02","url":"https://www.jax.org/strain/017639"}}}}
keywords: Neurofibromatosis type 1, NF1, Genotying, PCR, loxP

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"12pom","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7rlo3","text":"Primers for the Nf1  loxP1 site:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":32},{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d1cho","text":"P1: 5’-CTTCAGACTGATTGTTGTACCTGA-3’","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b9aa8","text":"P4: 5’-TGATTCCCACTTTGTGGTTCTAAG-3’ ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bmkt7","text":"P3: 5'-ACCTCTCTAGCCTCAGGAATGA-3'","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5a859","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2unqg","text":"Primers for the Nf1 loxP2 site:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":31},{"style":"italic","offset":16,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4m2fk","text":"LoxP2For: 5’-GCTTTAGCTTCTGGAAATGTGAA-3’ ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dttqi","text":"LoxP2Rev: 5’-GCGGGCTAAAATGGCAATGTCG-3’  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"419FE82A341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Specific Primers Forward and Reverse","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":3},"url":"","vendor":{"id":0,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.protocols.io","name":"Contributed by users"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6n5b1","text":"From a working solution of 10uM, use 1 uL of each primer (200nM each in a total volume of 20uL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2krl4","text":"Reaction for loxP1:  P1 + P2 + P3","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hf40","text":"Reaction for lopP2: LoxP2For + LoxP2Rev","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9lqk4","text":"Per reaction, mix 0.5uL of gDNA from the NaOH lysate (from step 2), 1 uL of each primer (from step 3.1), 10 uL   mix, and add water for a total volume of 20 uL ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":111,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9tqnt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cas_number":"","group_reagent":{},"guid":"B8189BE9232043ED97564AEBCA0E36E0","id":"","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"GoTaq® Green Master Mix ","rrid":"","sku":"M7123","url":"http://","vendor":{"id":1286,"image":{"placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.promega.com/","name":"Promega Corparation"}}}}}

title: Nf1 loxP site verification
